headline: A Look At Applied Materials (AMAT) Valuation After Sector Sell Off On AI Spending Concerns
summary: Applied Materials (AMAT) dropped 4.9% as part of a broad semiconductor sell-off after Nvidia’s strong earnings failed to keep sector momentum. This raised questions about the durability of AI spending despite generally upbeat sentiment toward the company. See our latest analysis for Applied Materials. Even after the 4.9% 1 day share price decline to US$375.72, Applied Materials still shows strong momentum, with a 30 day share price return of 12.93% and a 1 year total shareholder return of...
